metadata.title: CVE-2023-1972 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A potential heap based buffer overflow was found in_bfd_elf_slurp_version_tables() in bfd/elf.c. This may lead to loss ofavailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdb-multiarch - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdb-source - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdbserver - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gdb package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1').
